title: Iran’s spiritual reckoning and the end of clerical rule
summary_full: For decades, European policy toward Iran prioritised engagement with the regime over engagement with Iranian society. The Islamic Republic was treated as a permanent interlocutor rather than a contested authority ruling against its population
summary_public: For decades, European policy toward Iran prioritised engagement with the regime over engagement with Iranian society. The Islamic Republic was treated as a permanent interlocutor rather than a contested authority ruling…
